title: Masoor Dal Soup powder for Babies, Instant Dal Soup for Babies
content:
Healthy and protein-rich masoor dal soup powder for babies. This is the best way to feed dal to your baby in an instant and takes less than 5 mins to make.

Mahima loves dal soup. But it really pains to cook it in a pressure cooker then puree it. So many pots and pans to wash. So I made this instant soup powder which comes handy. Also, it can be mixed with cooked rice and ghee which makes a great lunch for babies.

 

Masoor Dal Soup Powder for Babies

 

Preparation time

10 mins

 

Cook time

5 mins

 

Total time

15 mins

 

Recipe type: Soup

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 1 cup

 

Ingredients

SOUP POWDER RECIPE:

Masoor Dal - 1 cup

Cumin Seeds / Jeerakan - 1 tsp

Asafoetida / Hing / Kaya Podi - ½ tsp

Turmeric Powder - 1 tsp

 

SOUP RECIPE:

Masoor Dal Powder - 1 tablespoon

Water - ½ cup

Salt to taste

 

Instructions

Wash and drain dal well.

Take masoor dal in a dry pan and roast till golden.

Take it in a blender. Dry roast cumin seeds, turmeric, and asafoetida.

Add it to the blender and blend till fine.

Store in an airtight container.

When making, take powder and water in a saucepan and cook till thick.

Add salt and mix well.

Cool and feed your baby.

recommendations.title: Steamed Dosa Recipe for Babies
recommendations.content: As soon as I posted my feeding schedule for baby, I got so many emails from the viewers asking me how to make steamed dosa for babies. I just replied to them the procedure, since it was too easy to be posted here. But many of you wanted the recipe. So here I am sharing it with you.

recommendations.title: Dal Soup Recipe for Babies
Healthy Vegetable Stir Fry Recipe for Kids and Toddlers
recommendations.content: This is a great dish to include veggies in your little one's diet. You can add whatever veggies you like in this. The addition of nuts powder in this makes it more tasty and healthy for your kids. You can serve this with rice or use it as a filling in paratha or use it as a filling for roti rolls

recommendations.title: Beetroot milk Recipe, Rose milk using Beetroots
recommendations.content:
Delicious rose milk made using beetroots. This is healthy for kids and toddlers. Instead of giving normal rose milk with lots of food coloring, you can give this beet milk.
